successes.title: Heroes of Normandie
successes.description: A game of heroic tactical warfare inspired by Hollywood world war II movies (with blood, guts and devil pigs...).

Pledges.description: Thank you for your support ! We really appreciate.

European buyers please add  £10,
US and Canadian buyers  add  £20

Receive 1 copy of "Heroes of Normandie"
+ US weapon platoon & German SS group add-on.

Special French resistance cell retailers Pledge.

You need to be a french retailer enlisted in the resistance to shipping costs to be able to pledge here.
Vous devez être un revendeur français enrôlé dans la résistance aux frais de port pour pouvoir réserver ce pledge.
Les détails de ce pledge sont ceux de l'offre 1 tels que présentés dans le mail que vous, Résistants, avait reçu.

Receive 2 copies of "Heroes of Normandie", two copies of the following add-ons : US weapon platoon & German SS group add-on + High command & Heroes and smoke add-on + Panzer Group & Sherman Platoon add-on + US Recon Platoon & German Pioneer Group + 2 Devil Pig patches AND ANY UNLOCKED STRETCH GOALS TWICE.

European buyers please add  £15,
US and Canadian buyers  add  £30
